thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Kunlun Tech to invest 100 mln yuan in investment fund
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Beijing Kunlun Tech to invest 100 mln yuan in investment fund | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Beijing Kunlun Tech to invest 100 mln yuan in investment fund
text:
Sept 16 Beijing Kunlun Tech Co Ltd
* Says plans to invest 100 million yuan ($15.70 million) in an investment fund
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1gqio0Z
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3694 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
